replies.body: Good lord, you type more in an average game of League than George RR Martin types in a month.

Teemo ADC lol

You're supposed to [pretend all team comps. are equally viable](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/JEOAcgnt-actually-penalized-for-stating-our-comp-was-unviable?show=flat) though and that you always have "late game."
Two wrongs don't make a right.  Also, when are you playing if you are typing all game?

> Getting banned in a game where people still playing are repeatedly calling me a retard

But .... you showed 3 games here ..

So because you get flamed that means flame back.

How very thin-skinned of you
